attributes.action: Automatic 2:1 university grade after loosing valuable time from the strike
attributes.additional_details:
There are 14 days in total which are a part of university striking, which looses valuable lecture time for students who pay there money to study to a high standard in further education. 
As this is the case we agree the lectures missed by this strike should automatically allow a 2:1 grade in compensation of limited lecture time.
attributes.background: Students pay £9250, per year to allow them self’s to be educated in a chosen subject. Without university students paying this money there would be a lack of professional people such as emergency services etc. With this strike it looses valuable time to achieve our grades for our degree.

rejection.details: This would be the responsibility of universities, rather than the UK Government or Parliament.
